summary: Completed frontend testing of the 'Manage Courses' dialog bug fix on /admin/colleges page. All features verified working correctly. The bug where courses were empty in the dialog has been fixed - courses are now fetched via API call to /api/colleges/{college_id}/courses instead of filtering from limited local cache.
passed_tests: Admin login works with admin@ohcampus.com / admin123
College Management page loads correctly at /admin/colleges
Page shows correct statistics: 8 Total Colleges, 22 Total Courses, 3 Closing Soon, 3 Closed
All 8 college cards display with correct course counts
AIMS college card shows '3 courses' - matches dialog content
PES University card shows '4 courses' - matches dialog content
Dialog shows college name, location, and category
Courses table displays with columns: Course Name, Duration, Level, Seat Status
AIMS dialog shows 3 courses: MBA (PG, 2 Years), BBA (UG, 3 Years), PGDM (PG, 2 Years)
PES University dialog shows 4 courses: B.Tech CSE, B.Tech ECE, M.Tech CS, MCA
Seat status dropdown is functional with 4 options: Available, Closing, Under Waiting, Closed
Changing seat status shows success toast: 'Seat status updated to Closing'
Status change updates the college card badges (Available/Closing counts)
Status change updates the page statistics (Closing Soon count)
Status Legend displays all 4 status options with correct colors
seed_data_creation: Using existing MongoDB seed data with 8 colleges, 22 courses
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 14 tested the bug fix for 'Manage Courses' dialog on /admin/colleges page. The bug was that courses were being filtered from a limited local cache of 100 courses instead of making a fresh API call. The fix added new state variables `selectedCollegeCourses` and `loadingCollegeCourses`, and modified `handleManageCourses` to fetch courses from `/api/colleges/{college_id}/courses` API endpoint when dialog opens. All features verified working: dialog opens with correct courses, table shows Course Name/Duration/Level/Seat Status, seat status dropdown works with all 4 options (Available, Closing, Under Waiting, Closed), and status changes are persisted and reflected in UI.

details: Dialog opens when clicking 'Manage Courses' button
Shows college name, location (city, state), and category
Courses are fetched via API call to /api/colleges/{college_id}/courses
Loading state shown while fetching courses
Courses table displays all courses for the selected college
Table headers: Course Name, Duration, Level, Seat Status
AIMS (col-1): 3 courses displayed correctly
PES University (col-2): 4 courses displayed correctly
Course counts match what's shown on college cards
Dropdown opens on click
Shows 4 options: Available, Closing, Under Waiting, Closed
Each option has appropriate icon and color
Selecting an option updates the status via API
Success toast shown after status change
UI updates to reflect new status (card badges, page statistics)
Page loads at /admin/colleges
Shows 8 Total Colleges, 22 Total Courses
Shows Closing Soon and Closed counts
Search and filter functionality present
Tabs: All Colleges, By City, By State, By Category, By Course

bug_fix_verification.original_issue: Manage Courses dialog was empty - courses were filtered from limited local cache of 100 courses
bug_fix_verification.fix_applied: Added API call to /api/colleges/{college_id}/courses in handleManageCourses function
bug_fix_verification.verification_result: FIXED - Dialog now shows all courses for selected college fetched directly from API
